name: judges
description: Simple webscrapper plus SPA site for visualisation public information about Ukraine's judges and prosecutors.

scripts.onboarding: (cd front-end && npm i) && (cd scraper && npm i)
scripts.import-declarations-in-local-mongodb: cd ./declarations.com.ua; for f in *.json; do mongoimport --db judges --collection declarations --host 127.0.0.1 --port 27017 --jsonArray $f; done
scripts.build: npm run erase && (cd front-end && npm run build) && (cd scraper && npm run scrap)
scripts.copy:static: copyfiles .nojekyll 404.html CNAME robots.txt ./dist/ && echo 'Static files copied.'
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:static && npm run copy:json
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run erase && (cd front-end && npm run build) && npm run copy:all && npm run push-to-gh-pages
scripts.deploy:all: (cd scraper && npm run scrap) && git add . && git commit -m 'Rescrap' && git push origin master && npm run deploy:frontend && npm run push-to-gh-pages
